instructions:
In double boiler, melt butter and stir in flour until smooth. Add milk gradually and cook about 3 minutes
while stirring. Add cheese and seasonings and stir until cheese is melted. Stir in additional milk or cheese to
reach desired thickness of sauce. *(It will thicken considerably as it cools.)* Serve over toast points. 
*(Rev.
10/30/92)*

Variations:
1. Fry and crumble bacon or sausage and add to
cheese sauce.
2. Use this sauce over asparagus spears and slices
of hot hard cooked eggs on toast.
ingredients: 1/2 inch slice Velveta, cut in chunks
name: Welsh Rarebit
